Description: This ESP LTD EC-256 is literally new. NO play wear, NO blemishes, NO B Stock. Factory Setup. Factory Strings. Zero play hours Manufacturers Description: The LTD EC-256 takes many of the coolest aspects of our higher-end EC Series models, and offers them to you in a super-affordable guitar that's ready to rock. A classic shape that's excellent for all musical styles and genres, the EC-256 looks amazing in either Black Satin or Snow White finishes, and has multiple binding on the body and headstock like you expect from high-quality guitars. Playing the EC-256 is also a dream come true, with set-neck construction for fast and easy access to the highest frets. The EC-256 also features a mahogany body, a comfortable three-piece thin U-shaped mahogany neck, a roasted jatoba fingerboard with flag inlays and 22 extra-jumbo frets, and great-sounding ESP Designed LH-150 pickups. SPECIFICATIONS Set-Neck SCALE: 24.75" BODY: Mahogany NECK: 3Pc Mahogany FINGERBOARD: Roasted Jatoba FINGERBOARD: RADIUS 350mm FINISH: Snow White NUT WIDTH: 42mm NUT TYPE: Molded NECK CONTOUR: Thin U FRETS/TYPE: 22 XJ HARDWARE COLOR: Black STRAP BUTTON: Standard TUNERS: LTD BRIDGE: TOM & Tailpiece NECK PU: ESP Designed LH-150N BRIDGE PU: ESP Designed LH-150B ELECTRONICS: Passive ELECTRONICS LAYOUT: Vol/Vol/Tone(P/P)/Toggle Switch CASE NOT INCLUDED Shipping Policy Available for local pickup from Green Bay, WI Ships from Green Bay, WI to: Continental U.S. $35.00 Alaska and Hawaii $50.00 SORRY, no international shipping Usually we charge a flat rate that is lower than actual shipping costs, in the event you live in a far away place shipping may be more. We'll play fair with shipping if you do too! Return Policy Due to the nature of used instruments as a general rule returns are not accepted on eBay sales. However, we at 920 Rocks/Guitar Basement, do understand sometimes a player does not mesh with their new guitar or that issues may arise that would require a return for a satisfied experience. So, we take returns on a item by item basis and chose not to be bound to the sites return policies. As the seller, we have the right to relay conditions of the sale, not a listing website. The buyer will always pay return shipping, and will not be refunded the initial shipping charges. Items that are agreed on to be returned must be returned in original, as-shipped condition with all original packaging and no signs of use. Again, buyer assumes responsibility for all return shipping costs We may ship via USPS, UPS or Fedex. We prefer to not send to PO Boxes however we understand some situations a PO Box is the only option, we will ship to PO Boxes with required signature. We will not deliver to un-manned PO Boxes
